item.description:
UPDATE:
Due to the threat of rain the festival is being postponed one week. Please adjust your RSVP if you need to.

The Hope Street Merchants Association is holding the annual "Hope for the Earth Festival" on the afternoon of Sunday, May 2nd. Much to the chagrin of those trying to drive along one of Providence's main thoroughfares, they'll be closing down five blocks of Hope Street. Come laugh at the frustrated motorists, and enjoy other festival fun... live music, delicious food, sidewalk sales, and performers.

I will be at the corner of Hope and Burlington at noon, and then wandering around after that. Hope to see you there!
